newsitem.title: USA: Track Data says to buy PC Quote unit.
newsitem.headline: Track Data says to buy PC Quote unit.

text.p: Track Data Corp said Friday it has entered into a non-binding letter of intent to acquire the non-Internet quotation business of PC Quote Inc.
Track Data said the business generated 1996 revenues in excess of $10 million. Track Data reported 1996 revenues of $47 million.

The company said the letter of intent contemplates a purchase price of up to 750,000 shares of the company's common stock, up to 50% of pre-tax earnings of the acquired business for a period of three years and the assumption of certain liabilities.

The company said the transaction is subject to board approvals, the satisfactory completion of due diligence, execution and delivery of a definitive purchase agreement and the satisfaction of certain other terms and conditions.
